road module¶

class road.Road(length: int, width: int, nb_vehicle: int)¶

Bases: numpy.ndarray

place_vehicles_1d()¶

Called upon initialization of the simulation to instantiate the vehicles and to place them as spread as possible using the simulation parameters (length of the road and number of vehicles).

Returns

Nothing

Clément Vellu

Shuffles the location of vehicles.

Returns

Nothing

Author

Mipam Quici

update_pos()¶

Updates the position of the vehicles on the road and brings the vehicles that reach the end of the road to the beginning of it.

Usually called for each step of the simulation.

Returns

Nothing

Author
